explain: to get rid of or remove
all of the living and nonliving things around a living thing
to continue to live or exist
the part of an environment where a plant or an animal lives
a sharp, curved nail on the foot of an animal like a cat or bird
to stay on top of water or in the air without sinking
the number that is two times ten
a very small, thin branch that has broken off a tree or bush

tearing

wisdom

clear

trouble

environment

survive

habitat

safe

claw

float

twenty
